attributes.action: McDonalds need to bring back Mozzarella Dippers!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
They are the most delicious thing McDonalds has ever released. Plus its actually healthier than fries, and so would reduce obeasety. McDonalds therefore need to release them as not just a 'Promotional item' but as an alternative to Fries.

Does Gordon like them too?

rejection.details: This petition has no point about Government policy.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
